articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: NASA creates history; to send the first woman and African American on a lunar flyby - Economic Times
articles.description: On Monday, April 3, NASA announced the four-member team for Artemis II mission. It will be the first crewed voyage around the moon in more than 50 years. Watch!
articles.content: On Monday, April 3, NASA announced the four-member team for Artemis II mission. It will be the first crewed voyage around the moon in more than 50 years. Watch!

articles.title: Scientists find a peptide that can replicate benefits of bariatric surgery, Ozempic - Mint Lounge
articles.description: Though human trials are pending, researchers from the American Chemical Society say a class of peptides has shown promising results in controlling obesity without major side-effects
articles.content: Imagine getting the benefits of gastric bypass surgery without having to go under the knife -- a new class of compounds may be able to do just that. These potential treatments significantly reduce bo… [+5269 chars]
